entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Jasha at the Imperial fort overlooking Bestine, asked you to plant a transmitter on a Rebel X-Wing, that was being refurbished in the Valarian depot. You accomplished this mission with little fuss.
entries.journal_entry_description: The Valarians are selling back to the Rebels an X-Wing that they recently aquired. The Empire wants you to plant a tracking transmitter on it so that Imperial intellegence can locate the new Rebel base.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You need to locate and plant a transmitter on an X-Wing that the Valarians currently have.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Excellent! Now we can track this fighter wherever it goes. If we are lucky it will lead us to the new Rebel base. I have credited your account.
